meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #719.

td.p: Laura Glendinning, a writer originally from Houston, Texas
Brian Nelson, a teaching assistant originally from Maryland
Beth Phillips, a photographer from Santa Fe, New Mexico (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,000)

tr.td: "B" IN SHAKESPEARE
CREDIT CARDS
SPORTSCASTERS
PRESIDENTIAL RELATIVES
DOGS
ANAGRAMS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', '(Beth: What is Asia?)
(Alex: No, sorry.)
(Brian: What is South America?)
(Alex: Noooo.)
[Beth rang in again.]
(Alex: Beth, you can\'t ring in again. Sorry about that. There\'s a rule on that. You\'re allowed one mistake per clue.)
[Laughter]

Australia

BethBrianLaura
')

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_3', 'clue_DJ_3_3_stuck', 'Line from Scottish poet Robert Burns that\'s found in the following patriotic song:

"You’re a grand old flag /
You’re a high-flying flag /
And forever in peace may you wave /
You’re the emblem of /
The land I love /
The home of the free and the brave /
Every heart beats true /
‘Neath the red white and blue /
Where there’s never a boast or brag..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Line from Scottish poet Robert Burns that's found in the following patriotic song:
"You’re a grand old flag /
You’re a high-flying flag /
And forever in peace may you wave /
You’re the emblem of /
The land I love /
The home of the free and the brave /
Every heart beats true /
‘Neath the red white and blue /
Where there’s never a boast or brag..."

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Term for what jewelers in London\'s Goldsmiths\' Hall stamped on their work to verify quality')

tr.td: WORD ORIGINS
Term for what jewelers in London's Goldsmiths' Hall stamped on their work to verify quality
Beth
Brian
Laura
2-day champion: $7,500
3rd place: Speed Queen washer & dryer + Jeopardy computerized version or box game
2nd place: trip on Eastern to Grand Bahamas and stay at Bahamas Princess Resort & Casino + Jeopardy computerized version or box game
Beth
Brian
Laura

13 R,
6 W
(including 2 DDs)
